content: **find the free version of this pattern on my blog ** https //www dublinbaycrochet com/blog/crochet-coasters-learn-how-to-make-a-sunflower-coaster this eye-catching sunflower coaster is perfect for adding a touch of sunny charm to your home decor with its vibrant colors and intricate detailing this coaster will make your coffee table sideboard or patio table look stunning this is a fun and rewarding project that you can complete in just a few minutes and it s perfect for gifts or for brightening up your own space it would be the perfect handmade addition to your fall decor construction this sunflower- shaped coaster is worked in the round without turning at the end of each round you will work 5 rounds in total in order to complete the coasters and the right side of your work will be always facing you this is an easy level crochet pattern ☑ instant download pdf file for sunny days crochet coaster pattern ☑ skill level beginners with experience reading patterns ☑ size each coaster measures 16 cm this pattern is written in one size only but you could make it bigger or smaller by changing the weight of yarn you are using and hook ☑ language american terms written in english ☑ you could use any yarn from your stash and play with different colour combinations here s what you will need any aran yarn i used paris by drops 100 % cotton 50 gr= 75 m *dandelion 14 - color a - 1 ball * medium pink 33 - color b- 1 ball 4 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle stitch markers scissors and measuring tape
